headline: Energy ETFs to Gain as Arctic Blast Ignites US Natural Gas Price Rally
summary: XLE and its peers could benefit as U.S. natural gas futures top $6/MMBtu following an Arctic blast that sparked a historic price surge and defied EIA forecasts.

headline: Exxon Mobil Reshapes Portfolio With CCS Push And Fife Plant Exit
summary: Exxon Mobil expanded its carbon capture and storage activities through new collaborations and projects, signaling a larger CCS footprint. The company is preparing to close its Fife Ethylene Plant, affecting European operations and employees. Exxon Mobil agreed to sell its Eagle Ford shale assets as part of ongoing portfolio reshaping. A new memorandum of understanding focuses on long term collaboration around hybrid vehicle technology. Exxon Mobil (NYSE:XOM), recently trading at $136.83,...

headline: Kazakhstan Seeks U.S. Approval to Buy Lukoil’s Kazakh Assets
summary: Kazakhstan has formally asked the U.S. Treasury for permission to buy out Lukoil’s sanctioned stakes in major oil fields and export infrastructure, citing legal pre-emption rights.
